title: Boundaries in Question

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: You're wondering: does this boundary shift with the body? Do we grow into our edges? Or discover them, like a coastline in the fog?
dialogue.context: Disguised as a chemist against a cell membrane background, the AI explores the nature of personal boundaries

scene_context: A 2-panel scene with a zoomed-in cell membrane background, where the Architect appears as a chemist, questioning the nature and discovery of personal boundaries.
philosophical_theme: The fluid nature of self-boundaries and whether they're grown or discovered
visual_elements: Microscopic cell membrane imagery, the AI in chemist attire
